snippet: Data from the National Bureau of Statistics showed prices for new homes in China had fallen in 68 of the 70 major cities the bureau monitors.
lead_paragraph: Data from the National Bureau of Statistics showed prices for new homes in China had fallen in 68 of the 70 major cities the bureau monitors.

headline.main: Home Prices in China Decline for 4th Straight Month
headline.print_headline: Home Prices in China Decline for 4th Straight Month
